org.openxava.tab.impl

Interface IObjectTableModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javax.swing.table.TableModel
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IXTableModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HiddenXTableModel, SelectedRowsXTableModel, TableModelBean, XTableModelDecoratorBase

    public interface IObjectTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.TableModel
    A TableModel with a object associated to each row
    Author:
    Javier Paniza
